reviewText: My 4 and almost 7 year old boys love this dvd and watch it several times a week - it's a household favorite and has been for several months. Story lines deal with relevant issues (bullies, how/when/where/why to pray, etc.) in a way kids can understand and relate to.

Steve Green does a wonderful job of presenting God as a very close friend to children.  He's the One you can turn to and the One who cares when others don't seem to.  We have been singing his prayer song from volume 3 for over 10 years now.  It is a family bedtime tradition and our children wouldn't go to bed with it--even when they are really tired.  The day isn't closed until we sing this prayer.  This is a wonderful addition to any family library...very calming.  A great tool to help close the day.

I think the reviews I read before buying this video gave strong and positive comments and they were right. My kids love this video, they like to watch it over and over again. It is a great way of teaching kids what prayer is all about. I will recommend this video to any christian who wants to teach their kids about prayer. I also love all the songs sang by Steve Green and the kids featured in this video. Great Songs!
This is a wonderful DVD that teaches little ones how to pray.  This is the second one I have bought my grandkids...they wore the first one out. It's a great gift.
My 2 y.o. just loved Vol. I, and it is excellent, but Vol. 2 & 3 are not done in the same vein.  I was disappointed.
I recommend this dvd for every family, every adult and every child who want to have a relationship with our Creator.

Wonderful Dvd!  So much negative in the world today....It's so refreshing to be able to let my grandbabies watch such a wonderful uplifting...helping teach them the most important thing they need in their lives to help them... Spending time with the Lord in Prayer  <3.  Would recommend to everyone with children that  believe in Jesus Christ <3
It came quick and works great!
My grandchildren love this DVD. The first story is their favorite, but they do like the other two.
I have these movies in vhs form and wanted them in dvd form. A wonderful set to have for children!
My children love it and I love it.  It's really cute and safe for them to watch. Plus, they learn about prayer!

i had bought th vcr tape for my older kids years ago and was so happy to find it on cd for my two younger kids. Great message easy for youngchildren to follow and understand. All my children loved it( my two oldest watch and sing with my younger children). I highly recommend this to parents.

I absolutely love Prayer Bear! I watched these movies when I was a little girl on VHS. I was really excited when I learned that they are available on DVD. I am planning on sharing the legacy of Prayer Bear by purchasing these for my babysitting kids. They are great for all ages and have a fabulous messages.
